name: Cody
description: Meet Cody — an onchain AI code-cracking game on @base and 2025 Onchain SF Summit winner. Each day a new secret drops and the prize pool grows daily. Guess with USDC to get a 0–100% score; the closer you are, the higher you rank. First to crack it wins the prize and unlocks the full pot for the leaderboard. Built with help from the Base team and the Clanker team. Play now on Base. Try a guess. Now!
